00030 bool
00031 LoadDataEscape::escape(const char *in_buf, size_t in_len,
00032                        const char **out_bufp, size_t *out_lenp) {
00033   bool transformed = false;
00034   const char *in_ptr = in_buf;
00035   const char *in_end = in_buf + in_len;
00036   const char *last_xfer = in_buf;
00037 
00038   while (in_ptr < in_end) {
00039     if (*in_ptr == '\n' || *in_ptr == '\t') {
00040       if (!transformed) {
00041         m_buf.clear();
00042         m_buf.reserve((in_len*2)+1);
00043         transformed = true;
00044       }
00045       memcpy(m_buf.ptr, last_xfer, in_ptr-last_xfer);
00046       m_buf.ptr += (in_ptr-last_xfer);
00047 
00048       *m_buf.ptr++ = '\\';
00049       if (*in_ptr == '\n')
00050         *m_buf.ptr++ = 'n';
00051       else
00052         *m_buf.ptr++ = 't';
00053       in_ptr++;
00054       last_xfer = in_ptr;
00055     }
00056     else
00057       in_ptr++;
00058   }
00059 
00060   if (transformed) {
00061     memcpy(m_buf.ptr, last_xfer, in_ptr-last_xfer);
00062     m_buf.ptr += (in_ptr-last_xfer);
00063     *m_buf.ptr = 0;
00064     *out_bufp = (const char *)m_buf.base;
00065     *out_lenp = m_buf.fill();
00066     return true;
00067   }
00068 
00069   *out_bufp = in_buf;
00070   *out_lenp = in_len;
00071   return false;
00072 }

00075 bool
00076 LoadDataEscape::unescape(const char *in_buf, size_t in_len,
00077                          const char **out_bufp, size_t *out_lenp) {
00078   bool transformed = false;
00079   const char *in_ptr = in_buf;
00080   const char *in_end = in_buf + (in_len - 1);
00081   const char *last_xfer = in_buf;
00082 
00083   if (in_len < 2) {
00084     *out_bufp = in_buf;
00085     *out_lenp = in_len;
00086     return false;
00087   }
00088 
00089   while (in_ptr < in_end) {
00090     if (*in_ptr == '\\' &&
00091         (*(in_ptr+1) == 'n' || *(in_ptr+1) == 't')) {
00092       if (!transformed) {
00093         m_buf.clear();
00094         m_buf.reserve(in_len+1);
00095         transformed = true;
00096       }
00097       memcpy(m_buf.ptr, last_xfer, in_ptr-last_xfer);
00098       m_buf.ptr += (in_ptr-last_xfer);
00099 
00100       if (*(in_ptr+1) == 'n')
00101         *m_buf.ptr++ = '\n';
00102       else
00103         *m_buf.ptr++ = '\t';
00104       in_ptr += 2;
00105       last_xfer = in_ptr;
00106     }
00107     else
00108       in_ptr++;
00109   }
00110 
00111   in_ptr = in_end + 1;
00112 
00113   if (transformed) {
00114     memcpy(m_buf.ptr, last_xfer, in_ptr-last_xfer);
00115     m_buf.ptr += (in_ptr-last_xfer);
00116     *m_buf.ptr = 0;
00117     *out_bufp = (const char *)m_buf.base;
00118     *out_lenp = m_buf.fill();
00119     return true;
00120   }
00121 
00122   *out_bufp = in_buf;
00123   *out_lenp = in_len;
00124   return false;
00125 }
